General.Name: Chonbang
General.Description: Chonbang Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells textiles in South Korea. The company offers yarns, dyed yarns, embroidery and sewing threads, denim, knit products, and raw materials. The company was formerly known as Chonnam Spinning Co., Ltd and changed its name to Chonbang Co., Ltd. in 1970. Chonbang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Chungjung Tower Building, Seoul, South Korea, 120-013

2.Name: Young-Gi  Choi
2.Title: Chief of Sales Division and Sr. Managing Director
